com.aisandbox.examples

Class BalancedCommander

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aisandbox.cmd.SandboxCommander
      • com.aisandbox.examples.BalancedCommander

  • public class BalancedCommander
extends SandboxCommander
    Sample "balanced" commander for the AI sandbox. One bot attacking, one defending and the rest randomly searching the level for enemies.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.aisandbox.cmd.SandboxCommander

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Called when the server sends the "initialize" message to the commander. Use this function to setup your bot before the game starts. You can also set this.verbose = true to get more information about each bot visually.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class SandboxCommander

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Called when the server sends a "tick" message to the commander. Override this function for your own bots. Here you can access all the information in this.gameInfo, which includes game information, and this.levelInfo which includes information about the level. You can send commands to your bots using the issue() method in this class.
        Specified by:
        tick in class SandboxCommander

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Called when the server sends the "shutdown" message to the commander. Use this function to teardown your bot after the game is over.
        Overrides:
        shutdown in class SandboxCommander
